    • colorblindcheck: Check Color Palettes for Problems with Color Vision Deficiency

Checking rcartocolor for colorblind friendly palettes

Jakub Nowosad

2024-10-10

Source: vignettes/articles/check_rcartocolor.Rmd
check_rcartocolor.Rmd
library(colorblindcheck)
library(rcartocolor)

Quantitative 

display_carto_all(type = "quantitative")

Colorblind friendly palettes

TealGrn 

TealGrn = carto_pal(7, "TealGrn")
colorblindcheck::palette_check(TealGrn, plot = TRUE)

#>           name n tolerance ncp ndcp min_dist mean_dist max_dist
#> 1       normal 7  4.525989  21   21 4.525989  20.41736 43.86276
#> 2 deuteranopia 7  4.525989  21   19 3.678936  21.46518 45.56837
#> 3   protanopia 7  4.525989  21   19 3.011912  20.41439 43.70189
#> 4   tritanopia 7  4.525989  21   19 4.490613  14.35030 31.12904
